text: aur munaafiqon ko dekh le (ki kaun hai) aur munaafiqon se kaha gaya ki aao khuda kee raah mein jehaad karo ya (ye na sahee apane dushaman ko) hata do to kahane lage (hae kya kaheen) agar ham ladana jaanate to zaroor tumhaara saath dete ye log us din banisbate eemaan ke kufr ke jyaada qareeb the apane munh se vah baaten kah dete hain jo unake dil mein (khaak) nahin hoteen aur jise vah chhipaate hain khuda use khoob jaanata hai
